meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation to express surprise or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: Criminy! I can't believe I forgot my lunch again.
meanings.sent2: Oh criminy, I spilled my drink all over the table.
meanings.sent3: Criminy, I accidentally wore mismatched socks to work today!
meanings.sent4: In the heat of the moment, she exclaimed 'criminy' as her phone slipped from her grasp.
meanings.sent5: The loud 'criminy' echoed through the room, catching everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of surprise or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Criminy! That magician made the rabbit disappear!
meanings.sent2: Wow, criminy, the traffic is really bad today.
meanings.sent3: Criminy, I can't believe I ate the whole pizza by myself!
meanings.sent4: As the final puzzle piece clicked into place, he let out a loud 'criminy' of satisfaction.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected plot twist left her shouting 'criminy' in disbelief.
